page.title: 12New Orton transport
page.content: The estate was only started in 1972 so all the transport facilities are new. {Cars }Use the large Parkway road which loops round the outside of the area. Smaller roads link wach neighbourhood. Cars are kept deliberately from driving through neighbourhoods for safety. {Buses }which run every 15 minutes till 6 pm. and every hour after have a special road which goes right through each neighbourhood. It costs 50 p. to ride into Peterborough. {Cyclists }have a system of cycle tracks which run alongside pavements and serve all areas of the new township. When they cross a large road they go under it in a subway. There is a cycleway that goes along the river Nene, linking the Ortons to the City Centre.
